Title: 13 Hours: The Secret Soldiers of Benghazi
Overview: An American Ambassador is killed during an attack at a U.S. compound in Libya as a security team struggles to make sense out of the chaos.
Tagline: When everything went wrong, six men had the courage to do what was right.
Keywords: based on novel, assault rifle, mercenary, libya, biography, based on true story, heroism, explosion, american abroad, death, 21st century, cia agent, u.s. ambassador
production_companies: Paramount Pictures, 3 Arts Entertainment, Bay Films, Latina Pictures, Dune Films
Cast: James Badge Dale, John Krasinski, Max Martini
